page.title: 08C.of E. Primary Exbourne
page.content: There is no school in Sampford,the Exbourne school is in this block. A village voluntary school or Dame School was here in 1839.The National School was established in 1876when the present school was built,of stone. There are 2 classrooms and 30 pupils. 13 pupils are in the Junior class and 17 pupils in the Infant class.Our dinner comes from Okehampton College. We usually have chips.We have 1 computer,1television,1 radio and 1 tape recorder between us.In our school we have 3 teachers,Mrs.Friend-Infants- Mrs.Goffey-top infants and lower juniors(in the Village Hall)and Mr. Morris(Headmaster)takes the top Juniors.We have a field for games across the main road.The 4th.yr. go to Okehampton College in September.
